name: Sons Of The Hunt
description:
This game is part-horror/thriller, intended for mature audiences. Ages 15+ recommended. Includes vulgar language, mentions of abuse, and explicit violence and gore.

[Despite the content, this game is intended to be absurd and comedic- don't take it too seriously!]

Play as an eager (and debatably disturbed) teenage boy, as you drag your 3 best friends along on a quest to find Bigfoot in the deep dark forest next to your town.

Strengthen your bond with your friends on this trip, and get close with one friend in particular. Whomever that is is totally your choice, they each have unique quirks and personalities that will shine as you spend this secluded time together.

And above all, finding Bigfoot is your biggest concern. The others may not understand your passion, but you will see fit that you will see this journey to the end! What could possibly go wrong with an adventure as juvenile as this?

  • Not Skyrim long, but enough content to keep you entertained with almost 18k total words
  • Custom player name
  • Loads of CGs
  • 3 romance options
  • A whopping total of 8 different endings, with achievements to match
  • 5 endings contained in the main game
  • A special route, which is unlocked after achieving every good ending
  • 3 endings contained in the special route 

Credit to the music used: Youtube playlist, DJ Rolfsky on Soundcloud
